extendedInfo.description: Fight the war in this crazy endless runner. With special guests: The Zombies, Pirates and Ninjas - each with their own special abilities.Press reports from the My Army Propaganda Office: "You'd be hard pressed to find a more frantic, heart pounding experience...it's a ball-breaking, time-sapping winner!" - Pocketgamer âRepeated attempts to top the high score inevitably follow, along with much tilting, swiping, gnashing of teeth and tearing of hairâ hallmarks of the just-one-more-go greats.â â The Observer Newspaper "Plenty of fun and it keeps you coming back for more" - Arcadelife The World is at war and MY ARMY needs you in this fun-filled and frantic war mission to liberate the fallen nations. Recruit your very own band of brothers, loot gold for extra supplies and let your walking (and gun!) do the talking. Weâve got powerful weapons in stock for you, latest spec tanks ready to rock ân roll and of course, our elite forces, such as âThe Zombiesâ are dying to come out and play war games with you. Sound good? If itâs SIR YES SIR, then put your best foot forward and enlist now, soldier! Features to blow (you) away: âWEâRE IN THE ARMY NOWâ Round up your elite squad from FACEBOOK and head out into battle. Keep your platoon safe and rescue POWs to join the troops to help you get further. Be the ultimate propaganda machine by sharing your juicy war stories on your wall. âFIELDS OF GOLDâ Loot enemy GOLD to equip your troops with necessary supplies, such as MAGNETS, UNIFORMS, VEHICLES, AIR SUPPORT and more! Recruit ZOMBIES, NINJAS and PIRATES with special powers to blow the enemy out of the water! âANOTHER ONE BITES THE BULLETâ The enemy is strong and clever â you never know where the next strike will come from. They are planting MINES, hurling MISSILES, setting places on fire and even CHEMICAL WEAPONS are not off limits! â45 NATION ARMYâ With 45 countries desperately clinging to hope of liberation, your troops have a tough task ahead of them. Your bravery will earn your squad higher RANKS, valuable ARMY POINTS, which allow you to trade with enemy to set the suffering nations free for EXTRA REWARDS. âTAKE CONTROL OF THE MISSION: POSSIBLEâ TILT to guide your squad, TAP to detonate the shells and SWIPE to re-target the bombs. Complete your OBJECTIVES for extra ARMY POINTS and GOLD. FOR FREE SUPPLIES AND REWARDS FOR THE TROOPS, PLEASE VISIT: WWW.BAD-PUPPET.COM TWEET US: @iambadpuppet LIKE US: facebook.com/iambadpuppet

reviews.title: Helpful, comparative, and fun
reviews.comment: The game is helpful to the gamers especially in the times of boredome and stress. The game also can be compared through other wargames which is historically inclined. The game is satisfactory to me but very fun to play. Good game.
reviews.author: Paulo Papa

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Good its a really awesome game but with an overpriced vehicles and hard to get golds needs some little bit more of work but this game rocks
reviews.author: John Arcie Caraveo

reviews.title: Awesome endless runner guys!
reviews.comment: This game is very fun and addictive! I really like this different style of endless runner! Great ideas and simple controls! Well done! If you are reading this, stop now and start downloading!
